properties.description: Extract Themes data from Azure Data Lake Storage, add a column, and load the data into Azure SQL Database

activities.name: Copy data from ADLS to ASQL
activities.description: Copy data from Azure Data Lake Storage to Azure SQL Server

activities.name: Copy CSV from HTTP to ADLS
activities.description: Copy CSV from Rebrickable to Azure Data Lake Storage

properties.description: Linked service to the orkadatalake Azure Data Lake Storage Account
Connection to the Entertainment database on the server orka-asql.database.windows.net
Linked service to the Lego downloads on Rebrickable: https://rebrickable.com/downloads/

	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 unpivot(output(
		Category_ID as string,
		Category_Name as string
	),
	ungroupBy(id),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
